Literature.Title: Small lipopeptides possess anti-biofilm capability comparable to daptomycin and vancomycin.
Literature.Author: Wang G, Lushnikova T, Mishra B

Literature.Title: Cationic Net Charge and Counter Ion Type as Antimicrobial Activity Determinant Factors of Short Lipopeptides.
Literature.Author: Greber KE, Dawgul M, Kamysz W, Sawicki W

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=128 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=6.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=50µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3.1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>50µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 200(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 400(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus MU50(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=6.25µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>25µM),Candida glabrata ATCC 2001(MIC=25µM),Candida tropicalis ATCC 13803(MIC=6.25µM),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=<=6.25µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=<=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis PCM 2118(MIC=4µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=32µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris PCM 2668(MIC=>512µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=128µg/ml),Candida tropicalis PCM 2681(MIC=256µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 16404(MIC=256µg/ml)
